scripts.say: You've already called back all your planes in preparation for our attack...
Hey, you know that you've been left for dead, right? And despite knowing that you're a decoy, you still have the will to fight?
Do you think you can shake my resolve with those words? Laughable. I knew about this long ago.
If my sacrifice can bring victory to all my comrades, I will gladly go through hell for their sake!
... So this is the determination of the Sakura Empire.
Hmph! What's so impressive about that? If it's for Indy's sake, I would gladly set this entire world on fire!
I heard that the Union was a country of weaklings, but it seems that there are those who have true resolve.
...Wait, why are you two suddenly bonding over this?!
Even if I am abandoned, you will find that I am not so easily beaten!
Listen up, warriors from the land of the free! I am Ryuujou, a ranger from the land of the rising sun!
You'll have to beat me first before you can call me a decoy!
Virtuous dragons, devour the enemies before us! Advance!
